page.title: 15The Oldest Resident.
page.content: We interviewed Mrs.Rose Reynolds who is the oldest resident in Harvington. She was born in Somerset ninety five years ago.She was married in nineteen hundred and nine and moved to Harvington in nineteen hundred and fourteen.She always worked on the land.She remembers when the main street was a dirt road,and she used to drive cattle to Evesham market every Monday.She rode on top of a hay cart while her sister drove,when they took the hay to Anchor Meadows to feed the cows.She caught the train from Harvington station when she wanted to go shopping in Evesham.It used to cost her one shilling.She lives in a little bungalow just up the road from our school and the children wave to her as they go past.Mrs Reynolds still gets up at half past five and reads without glasses.We liked talking to her.
